Willow in The Healing

Southgate High school is full of drama. Friends turning on each other, parents with drinking problems, pressure and relationships. When Valentina meets Cassie's new Tutor she is head over heels in love. But is it destined to be? And when Valentin catches Cassie's boyfriend kissing Beatrice their friendship will be put to the ultimate test. And will be Beatrice's mum ever get the help she needs? Join Cassie, Beatrice and Valentina as they find out just how much drama you can find in a sixth form.
